item.title: 📝 Brin's Notes: The Common Toad
item.description: General Notes I have read Orwells classics – Animal Farm & 1984 Most of the mentioned authors and books are alien to me, my context comes from purely reading the book My ability to analyse literature is very amateur The Common Toad His thoughts on the “need” to be in the nature remind me a lot of what I read/know so far about Walden.
